Subject: Important Update to Security Advisory – ADV-2024-002 – Remote Code Execution Vulnerabilities in CoSo
Description:
I’ve looked over the security advisory that was provided and had a couple questions.

-Endpoint Protector Server
  -Cloud
  -On-Prem
-Windows Endpoint Protector Client
-macOS Endpoint Protector Client.
